content.query:
SELECT 
    CAST([tpep_pickup_datetime] AS DATE),
    COUNT(*) AS ride_per_day
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://covidgentwo.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse-analytics-ws/yellow_tripdata_2024-01.parquet',
    FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS [nyc]
GROUP BY CAST([tpep_pickup_datetime] AS DATE)
ORDER BY 1 ASC
